page.title: 20CREDITS_SOUTH REIGATE BLOCK
page.content: In order to complete our assignment in the short time available it was allocated to a small working party of Mandy Wickes,Claire Revel,Julia Dunn and Hannah Taylor,who operated the computer and did the field-work.Penny Heard,Louise Peckham and Imogen Hibbs assisted them.Most of the children in the school contributed ideas to the page on homelife.Friends and teachers in the community offered pages. P.1_Mr Beales. P.2_Claire,Mandy,Julia and Hannah. P.3_Mr Buxton. P.4_Imogen Hibbs. Pp.5,12,13,14,15,16,19-Mr Hasler. P.6_Mr Robinson. P.7-Miss Keane P.8-Dr Ingram. P.9_Craig Humphrey & Robert Nagle. P.10_Mr Panter. P.11_P.C.Bartlett. P.17_Mr Arnold. P.18_Mr Reason. P.20_The Team
